Rulings.Edison: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Tengu:
● The effect to use Synchro Material monsters in the hand isn't affected by cards like "Skill Drain".

● Using monsters in the hand is optional.

● "T.G." monsters in the hand can be mixed with monsters on the field as applicable.● The effect to search starts a chain during the End Phase.

● If this card leaves the graveyard before the End Phase, the effect does not activate.

● Multiple "T.G." monsters do not form a chain during the End Phase.

● If destroyed while "Thunder King Rai-oh" is face-up on the field, the effect can still be activated during the End Phase if "Thunder King Rai-oh" leaves the field, is negated or otherwise stops applying before the turn ends.

Rulings.Base:
1. No part of this effect is affected by "Skill Drain".
2. You don't have to use monsters in your hand as Synchro Material Monsters.
3. You can use a mix of monsters on the field and "T.G." monsters in your hand as Synchro Material Monsters.
4. If you target your opponent's "T.G. Cyber Magician" with "Synchro Material", you cannot use "T.G." monsters in your hand as Synchro Material Monsters.
5. You can use "T.G." monsters in your hand as Synchro Material Monsters when you Synchro Summon with this card due to "Urgent Tuning".
6. The following rules apply to "T.G. Cyber Magician", "T.G. Striker", "T.G. Warwolf", and "T.G. Rush Rhino".

If this card is destroyed while face-down, its effect to add a "T.G." monster to your hand still activates during the End Phase.

The effect to add 1 "T.G." monster from your Deck to your hand activates in the GY, during your End Phase, only if this card is still in the GY. It does not need to be in the GY when the effect resolves.

If your opponent controls this card when it is destroyed, its effect to add a "T.G." monster to your hand still activates.

PSCT.Base: If this card you control would be used as Synchro Material for a "T.G." monster, "T.G." monsters in your hand can be used as the non-Tuner Synchro Materials. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed on the field and sent there this turn: You can add 1 "T.G." monster from your Deck to your hand, except "T.G. Cyber Magician".
